item.title: Techtribe Community
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
Introduction:

Swecha is a non-profit organization based in India dedicated to promoting and advancing the use of free and open-source software (FOSS) and digital freedoms. Founded on the principle of 'Swecha', meaning freedom in Telugu, the organization focuses on bridging the digital divide by advocating for the adoption of FOSS and providing access to technology for all, particularly in rural and underserved communities. Swecha conducts workshops, seminars, and training programs to raise awareness about the significance of FOSS and to equip individuals with the skills needed to use and develop open-source software. Additionally, the organization actively contributes to the development of FOSS projects and collaborates with other local and international communities and oganizations. Through its initiatives, Swecha aims to empower individuals with the knowledge and tools required to participate in the digital era while championing principles of freedom, privacy, and transparency.

Object Overview:

 

FOSS advocacy: FOSS (Free and Open-Source Software) advocacy involves promoting the use of software that grants users the freedom to run, study, modify, and distribute the software without restrictions. Advocates believe that FOSS encourages collaboration, innovation, and transparency in software development.

Digital freedoms: Digital freedoms refer to the rights of individuals to access, use, and share digital information and technology freely, without censorship or surveillance. These freedoms encompass principles such as privacy, freedom of expression, access to information, and the ability to use technology without undue restrictions.

Community empowerment: Community empowerment involves supporting individuals and communities to develop the skills, resources, and confidence needed to address their own needs and improve their quality of life. This can include providing education, training, access to resources and oppotunities

Open-source software development: Open-source software development refers to the collaborative process of creating software whose source code is freely available for anyone to use, modify, and distribute. This approach encourages transparency, peer review, and collaboration among developers, leading to the rapid evolution and improvement of software.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
CMR Institute of Technology, established in 2005, is renowned as one of the premier engineering colleges for aspiring students in the field. Situated across 10 acres of land, with a substantial built-up area spanning 31132.72 square meters, CMR Institute of Technology is one of the three esteemed colleges under the MGR Educational Society.

The institution's mission is singularly focused on offering students an optimal platform for their academic pursuits as well as holistic personality development in the realms of Engineering, Technology, and Management. Over the years, the college has maintained a rich tradition of achieving academic excellence while nurturing the overall personal growth of its students.

COLLEGE DIRECTOR

Dr. M. Janga Reddy

M.Tech. (IT), Ph.D., MISTE Director

COLLEGE PRINCIPAL

Dr. B. SATYANARAYANA

B.Tech., M.Tech., Ph.D.

DEAN OF ACADEMICS

Dr. Vinit Kumar Gunjan

Dean of Academics Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science & Engineering

DEAN OF STUDENTS AFFAIRS AND ACTIVITIES

Dr. S. Dhanalakshmi

Dean Students Affairs and Activities, Associate Professor, CSE (AI & ML)

HEAD OF THE DEPARTMENT

COMPUTER SCIENCE ENGINEERING

Dr. K. PRADEEP REDDY​

B.Tech., M.Tech., Ph.D.

COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING (AI&ML)

item.content:encoded:
About Us

Fine Arts Club is vivacious and energetic with lot of activities throughout the academic year to bring out the artistic talents of the students. Its prime aim is to offer umpteen opportunities to unearth the artistic talent and skills of the students. This club provides the best platform for the arts like Painting, Drawing, Pencil arts, Doodles, Splatters, Cartoon or anime drawings, potriats, Hand paintings, Indian Ethnicity paintings, Contentful drawings a lot to include.

“Everything you can imagine is real and everything that you see around would be someone’s imagination.”

item.title: GDSC
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
What are the Google Developer Student Clubs (GDSC)?
Google Developer Student Clubs (GDSC) are university-based community groups powered by Google Developers for students interested in Technology. The aim is to help students bridge the gap between theory and practice. By joining a GDSC, students grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and communities.

Who can join GDSC CMRIT?
Students from all undergraduate or graduate programs with an interest in growing as a developer are welcome. By joining GDSC CMRIT, students grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and their community.

How can I be a member of GDSC CMRIT?
Go to our website https://gdsc.community.dev/cmr-institute-of-technology-hyderabad/ click on the JOIN button and register yourself, this makes you an official member of GDSC CMRIT. This membership will provide you with exclusive access to upcoming webinars, workshops, and community events hosted by GDSC CMRIT, allowing you to explore various technologies.

Benefits of joining Google Developer Student Club CMRIT:
-Attend workshops, hackathons, challenges, projects, and other events
-Expand your technical skills through a peer-to-peer learning environment
-Help build solutions by participating in the annual Solution Challenge competition with the chance of winning prizes from Google
-Increase in networking opportunities through industry leaders, tech professionals, and Googlers
-Improve your soft skills through various club activities

item.title: Pure Youth
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
Introduction: Pure Youth Club is dedicated to extending a helping hand to those in need, particularly in the realm of education. Our mission is simple yet profound: to empower disadvantaged youth by providing them with the tools and resources they need to pursue their educational aspirations. We believe that education is the key to breaking the cycle of poverty and unlocking endless opportunities for growth and success. At Pure Youth Club, we offer a wide range of initiatives tailored to meet the unique needs of each individual we serve. From scholarship programs and tutoring sessions to access to educational materials and mentorship opportunities, we strive to create a supportive environment where every child can thrive academically and personally.

item.title: Pro-grammers
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
About Us

PRO GRAMMARS is an innovative, resource driven, and Enthusiastic Literary Club founded by high spirited passionate students of CMR which will deliver opportunities and assistance to all those who are aspiring to have a strong foundation in speaking, writing and leadership skills.

The club PRO GRAMMARS is a Literary club based on ideas of innovation Established in August 2019 and is the first literary club started in CMRIT and has left a milestone in memory of college with the biggest Literary carnival "Nexus" held in college Premises in which a well over 750 students participated from all departments. With high enthusiasm and high spirit the club will soon deliver it's magazine and conduct many more events aiming to improve vocabulary, Grammar, Speaking skill and Team Skills of students. On a whole Pro Grammars has laid a mile stone for all future and present student to put their best efforts and dedication in personality and speaking growth. In short span of time the club has gained fame and recognition by CMRIT and all esteemed college outside. The club stand for it's moto- "Discover Yourself "

item.title: Ikshana
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
About Us

Ikshana Foundation CMRIT, was established on May 6, 2019, by a dynamic team of 15 volunteers. In response to the hardships faced by small orphanages during the 2020 pandemic, we took a proactive stance, organizing events at CMRIT to raise funds and awareness. 

Ikshana stands out for its proactive approach, creating opportunities through poster competitions, Ganesha making, gaming events, and Christmas donation drives. We've channeled the social expressions of youngsters to not only raise funds but also instill a sense of responsibility and empathy. Our impact is tangible – funds collected have fulfilled basic necessities for small orphanages, and we've extended our reach by distributing food packs to the needy. 

As we continue to grow,  Ikshana invites like-minded individuals and organizations to join us in being a source of happiness and hope of many pure souls.

item.title: IIC
item.dc:creator: 21r01a67j3
item.content:encoded:
About Us

IIC, CMRIT
Ministry of Education (MoE), Govt. of India has established "MoE's Innovation Cell (MIC)" to systematically foster the culture of Innovation amongst all Higher Education Institutions (HEIs). The primary mandate of MIC is to encourage, inspire and nurture young students by supporting them to work with new ideas and transform them into prototypes while they are informative years.

MIC has envisioned encouraging creation of "Institution's Innovation Council (IICs)" across selected HEIs. A network of these IICs will be established to promote innovation in the Institution through multitudinous modes leading to an innovation promotion eco-system in the campuses.

As per the guidelines of Ministry of Education, CMRIT established Institutions Innovation Council (IIC) in the year 2018 with a vision of nurturing the culture of Innovation and Entrepreneurship among the students and faculty. The primary focus of IIC is to normalize the resources and create additional infrastructure for Product Development, commercialization and venture development.

item.title: Agon E-sports
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
AGON Esports club is a group of individuals who come together to compete in various video games at a professional level.
The primary objective of the AGON Esports club is to provide a community for gamers who share a common interest in competitive gaming. AGON Esports club typically offers a variety of opportunities for members, to compete against each other in the tournaments, to exhibit their gaming skills and upgrade the existing ones.The members of this club typically practice regularly to improve their skills and coordination, and they may also participate in coaching, team management, and event planning.
playing video games can improve cognitive skills such as attention, memory, and spatial reasoning.hence,this club helps in improving visual-spatial skills and decision-making abilities of their members.
Overall,AGON Esports club is a place for gamers to come together, learn and develop skills, compete, and have fun and take a refreshing break from academics.

item.title: HSGA
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
The Hindustan Scouts & Guides is a voluntary, non-political educational Movement for young people, open to all without distinction of origin, race or creed, in accordance with the purpose, principles and method conceived by the Founder Lord Baden- Powell in 1907.

The purpose of the Movement is to contribute to the development of young people in achieving their full physical, intellectual, emotional, social and spiritual potentials as individuals, as responsible citizens and as members of the local, National and International communities.

The Aim of Scouting and Guiding is four-fold. The first is the formation of character; the second is the formation of sound health habits. The third is the training in the handicraft and the acquiring of useful skills; and the fourth is the education of a proper spirit of service efficiently. This aim leads to the development of good citizenship, among boys and girls.

 

OBJECTIVES:

· Physical Fitness and Drill.

· Yoga and Meditation.

· Stick Fights and Martial Arts.

· Knowing about Nature and Society.

· Helping Neighbors, Poor and Needy.

· Learning about Indian Traditions and Culture.

· Respecting Elders/Parental Relations

· Social Service like Swatch Bharath.

· Social Awareness, and public services

· Moral Values and Ethics

· Service at Pilgrims, Hospitals

· Government offices and Reservations

 

BENEFITS OF SCOUTING:

· 2% Scout Quota at Railway and Central Government Jobs.

· Scout quota for Higher Education.

· 50% Fare acceptance on Public Transport.

· Eligible for Governor/President medals or Awards.

· Privilege to participate in National Scouting Programme at New Delhi.

item.title: Music Club
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
KOLD PROJEKT is a college music club that was founded by a group of music enthusiasts who wanted to create a community where they could share their passion for music and explore different genres together.

KOLD PROJEKT encourages its members to participate in events and activities organized by other college music clubs as well. The club believes that by collaborating with other communities, they can learn new things, gain exposure to different styles of music, and make new connections.
By participating in events hosted by other colleges.
Furthermore, participating in events organized by other college music clubs allows "KOLD PROJEKT" to contribute to a broader musical ecosystem.


On a whole,KOLD PROJEKT is more than just a music club. It is a community of passionate individuals who share a love of music and a desire to create a positive change.
Through their dedication,this club has become a vibrant and impactful presence in the college and beyond.

item.title: Spectrum Sparks
item.dc:creator: rushi12565
item.content:encoded:
We, the team Prompt Techies, were thrilled to host Spectrum Sparks on 18 March 2024, an event dedicated to fostering creativity and innovation among students. The event featured an exciting competition where participants engaged in a series of modules designed to explore the capabilities of Al-generated art.

During the initial phase, students interacted with AI modules to explore into its applications in art. They grasped the basics and conducted experiments. Moving on to the next stage, they crafted AI-generated images with sophisticated tools, displaying creativity that goes above and beyond.

In the next phase of the program, students were challenged to explore the intersection of AI and music. They were introduced to innovative AI software that allowed them to compose original pieces and remix classic tunes with a modern twist. The students embraced this opportunity to blend their musical talents with cutting-edge technology, resulting in mesmerizing compositions that pushed the boundaries of traditional music creation.

As the program progressed, students ventured into the realm of AI in literature. They were tasked with collaborating with AI algorithms to co-write short stories and poems. The students were amazed by the AI's ability to generate unique plot twists and imaginative narratives, inspiring them to think outside the box and experiment with new storytelling techniques.

Throughout the entire journey, the students not only honed their technical skills but also fostered a deep appreciation for the limitless creative possibilities that AI offers. By embracing AI as a tool for artistic expression, they discovered a newfound sense of freedom to explore uncharted territories in the realms of art, music, and literature.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
About

CMR Institute of Technology is one of the best engineering Colleges for aspiring engineering students. It is one of the three colleges established by MGR Educational Society. CMR Institute of Technology was established in 2005 in 10 Acres and built up area of 31132.72 Sq.M. with a single – minded aim to provide a perfect platform to students in the field of Engineering, Technology and Management for their academic and overall personality development. The College has a rich tradition of soaring high with academic excellence & overall personal growth of students.

item.title: Street Cause
item.dc:creator: techtribe2025
item.content:encoded:
Street Cause, an embodiment of societal transformation and altruistic endeavors, epitomizes the ethos of community-driven activism and compassionate service. Founded by visionary individuals imbued with a fervent desire for societal betterment, Street Cause stands as a bastion of innovation, resourcefulness, and unyielding zeal in its noble quest to uplift humanity.

Established in 2019, Street Cause swiftly ascended to prominence, emerging as a cornerstone of philanthropic initiatives and social responsibility. From extending aid to the marginalized to orchestrating grand-scale events for societal enlightenment, Street Cause has consistently demonstrated an unwavering dedication to effecting positive change.It covers several areas auch as Education, Women empowerment, Environment , Orphanges ,Social impact and Animal Welfare that have impacted over 5000 people.

Among its illustrious achievements, Street Cause takes pride in its hallmark events , a splendid affair that garners widespread acclaim and participation, leaving an indelible imprint on the collective consciousness of the community. With each endeavor, Street Cause endeavors to empower individuals, nurture leadership acumen, and foster a culture of empathy and inclusivity. Street Cause has successfully raised and allocated approximately INR 6,50,000 towards its diverse array of projects, effectively contributing to its mission of societal betterment and impactful community initiatives.

As we gaze toward the horizon, the vision remains resolute – to serve as a catalyzing force for societal upliftment and a beacon of hope for the downtrodden. Through its multifaceted initiatives, Street Cause aspires to inspire others to join its noble cause, thereby heralding the dawn of a brighter, more compassionate world.

In alignment with its guiding principle of "A life without a cause is a life without an effect," Street Cause extends a heartfelt invitation to any individual to uncover their latent potential, effect meaningful change, and leave an indelible legacy of benevolence upon society.

item.title: Prompt Techies
item.dc:creator: rushi12565
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Prompt Techies Club!

We at Prompt Techies are committed to helping our members develop their technological abilities, be creative, and innovate. Technology enthusiasts can come together in our group to learn, experiment, and work together on a dynamic platform. By use of a sequence of exercises and challenges, our objectives are to stimulate creative thinking, improve technical proficiency, and foster a lively community of enthusiastic people. Prompt Techies provides a platform for you to network, learn, and develop whether you’re an experienced programmer, a hardware enthusiast, or just inquisitive about cutting edge technology. Come along with us as we take on fascinating projects, explore the newest technological developments, and set off on a journey of exploration into the ever-changing world of technology.

Objectives of CMRIT Prompt Techies Club

The CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT) Prompt Techies Club is committed to fostering a dynamic community of technology enthusiasts within the institution. Our objectives are designed to promote innovation, enhance technical skills, and prepare students for the challenges of the tech industry. Through our club, we aim to:

  1. Promote Innovation: Inspire creativity by providing regular prompts and challenges related to technology and engineering.
  2. Enhance Technical Skills: Offer opportunities for hands-on projects that allow students to improve their technical abilities.
  3. Encourage Collaboration: Foster a collaborative environment where students can work together, share ideas, and learn from one another.
  4. Explore Emerging Technologies: Encourage exploration and experimentation with emerging tech trends through prompt-based projects.
  5. Support Career Development: Provide resources and networking opportunities to assist students in their career development within the technology sector.

Executive Board

Gallery

Recent Activites

Cybersphere

We, the team Prompt Techies, were thrilled to host on cybersphere 29 February 2024, an event dedicated to fostering creativity and innovation among students. The event featured an exciting competition... Read More

Spectrum Sparks

We, the team Prompt Techies, were thrilled to host Spectrum Sparks on 18 March 2024, an event dedicated to fostering creativity and innovation among students. The event featured an exciting... Read More

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: rushi12565
item.content:encoded:
CMR Institute of Technology, established in 2005, is renowned as one of the premier engineering colleges for aspiring students in the field. Situated across 10 acres of land, with a substantial built-up area spanning 31132.72 square meters, CMR Institute of Technology is one of the three esteemed colleges under the MGR Educational Society.

The institution’s mission is singularly focused on offering students an optimal platform for their academic pursuits as well as holistic personality development in the realms of Engineering, Technology, and Management. Over the years, the college has maintained a rich tradition of achieving academic excellence while nurturing the overall personal growth of its students.

CMR Institute of Technology, established in 2005, is renowned as one of the premier engineering colleges for aspiring students in the field. Situated across 10 acres of land, with a substantial built-up area spanning 31132.72 square meters, CMR Institute of Technology is one of the three esteemed colleges under the MGR Educational Society.

The institution’s mission is singularly focused on offering students an optimal platform for their academic pursuits as well as holistic personality development in the realms of Engineering, Technology, and Management. Over the years, the college has maintained a rich tradition of achieving academic excellence while nurturing the overall personal growth of its students.

DIRECTOR

Dr. M. Janga Reddy

M.Tech. (IT), Ph.D., MISTE Director

PRINCIPAL

Dr. B. SATYANARAYANA

B.Tech., M.Tech., Ph.D.

DEAN OF ACADEMICS

Dr. Vinit Kumar Gunjan

Associate Professor, B.Tech., M.Tech., Ph.D.

DEAN OF STUDENTS AFFAIRS

Dr. S. Dhanalakshmi

Professor, B.E., M.E., Ph.D.

Computer Science And Engineering ​

Dr. K. Pradeep Reddy

HOD(CSE) B.Tech., M.Tech., Ph.D.

Computer Science And Engineering (AI&ML)​

Dr. L. Arokia Jesu Prabhu

HOD(CSE-AIML) B.Tech., M.Tech., Ph.D.

Computer Science And Engineering (Data Science)

Dr. A.Nirmal Kumar

HOD(CSE-DS) B.E., M.E., Ph.D.

Electronics and Communication Engineering

Dr. K. Niranjan Reddy

HOD(ECE) B.E., M.Tech., Ph.D.

Mechanical Engineering​

Mr. G.Venkat Ramana

HOD(Mech.) B.Tech., M.Tech., Ph.D.

Civil Engineering​

Mr. K. Srinivas

HOD(CE) (M.E, MISTE. Associate Professor

Master Of Business Administration​

Dr. G. SaiRekha

HOD(MBA) MBA, M.Com, M.Phil, Ph.D

Humanities & Sciences

Dr. Radhakrishna Reddy

HOD(H&S) MSc,Ph.D

ABOUT US

ABOUT US

CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT) in Hyderabad, Telangana, is an esteemed engineering college affiliated with the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Hyderabad. Here are some additional details about CMRIT:

Accreditations and Affiliations: CMR Institute of Technology is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with JNTU, Hyderabad. These accreditations ensure that the academic programs offered by CMRIT meet national standards of quality education.

Courses Offered: The institute offers undergraduate (B.Tech), postgraduate (M.Tech), and doctoral programs (Ph.D.) in various disciplines of engineering, technology, and management. Some of the popular branches include Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering.

Faculty: CMRIT boasts a highly qualified and experienced faculty team comprising professors, associate professors, and assistant professors. The faculty members are not only dedicated to imparting quality education but also engage in research and industry collaborations.

Infrastructure: Apart from the substantial built-up area mentioned earlier, CMRIT's campus is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities including modern classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, a central library with a vast collection of books and online resources, seminar halls, auditoriums, sports facilities, and hostel accommodation for students.

Industry Collaborations and Internship Programs: CMRIT has established collaborations with various industries and organizations to facilitate industry exposure and internships for its students. These collaborations help students gain practical knowledge and experience in their respective fields.

Placement Opportunities: The institute has a dedicated placement cell that facilitates campus placements for its students. Many reputed companies from various sectors visit the campus for recruitment drives, offering job opportunities to eligible students.

Research and Innovation: CMRIT encourages research and innovation among its students and faculty members. The institute supports research initiatives through funding, collaboration with industry partners, and participation in conferences and seminars.

Student Activities: CMRIT promotes extracurricular activities, clubs, and student organizations to foster overall personality development and a vibrant campus life. These activities include technical events, cultural festivals, sports competitions, and community service initiatives.

CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT) in Hyderabad, Telangana, stands as a prominent institution in the field of engineering education. Here's a more detailed overview of CMRIT:

Accreditations and Affiliations: CMR Institute of Technology holds approval from the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Hyderabad. These accreditations ensure that the academic programs offered by CMRIT adhere to national standards of quality education.

Courses Offered: CMRIT offers a wide range of academic programs including undergraduate (B.Tech), postgraduate (M.Tech), and doctoral (Ph.D.) programs. The institute provides courses in various disciplines of engineering, technology, and management. Some of the popular branches include Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Information Technology, Civil Engineering, and Electrical and Electronics Engineering.

Faculty: CMRIT prides itself on its distinguished faculty team comprising experienced professors, associate professors, and assistant professors. These faculty members are not only dedicated to delivering quality education but also actively engage in research and industry collaborations, enriching the learning experience for students.

Infrastructure: CMRIT boasts a modern campus equipped with state-of-the-art facilities. This includes spacious and well-equipped classrooms, advanced laboratories, a central library stocked with an extensive collection of books and online resources, seminar halls, auditoriums, sports facilities, and comfortable hostel accommodation for students.

Industry Collaborations and Internship Programs: CMRIT has forged strong collaborations with various industries and organizations to provide students with exposure to real-world challenges and opportunities through internships. These collaborations play a crucial role in enhancing students' practical knowledge and skills, making them industry-ready professionals.

Placement Opportunities: CMRIT maintains a dedicated placement cell that works tirelessly to facilitate campus placements for its students. The institute attracts numerous reputed companies from diverse sectors to conduct recruitment drives on campus, offering promising job opportunities to eligible students.

Research and Innovation: CMRIT fosters a culture of research and innovation among its students and faculty members. The institute actively supports research initiatives through funding, industry collaborations, and participation in conferences and seminars, encouraging students to explore new ideas and contribute to the advancement of knowledge.

Student Activities: CMRIT places significant emphasis on extracurricular activities, clubs, and student organizations to promote overall personality development and a vibrant campus life. These activities include technical events, cultural festivals, sports competitions, community service initiatives, and more, providing students with a well-rounded educational experience.

CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT) in Hyderabad, Telangana, is an esteemed engineering college affiliated with the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Hyderabad. Here are some additional details about CMRIT:

Accreditations and Affiliations: CMR Institute of Technology is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with JNTU, Hyderabad. These accreditations ensure that the academic programs offered by CMRIT meet national standards of quality education.

Courses Offered: The institute offers undergraduate (B.Tech), postgraduate (M.Tech), and doctoral programs (Ph.D.) in various disciplines of engineering, technology, and management. Some of the popular branches include Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering.

Faculty: CMRIT boasts a highly qualified and experienced faculty team comprising professors, associate professors, and assistant professors. The faculty members are not only dedicated to imparting quality education but also engage in research and industry collaborations.

Infrastructure: Apart from the substantial built-up area mentioned earlier, CMRIT's campus is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities including modern classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, a central library with a vast collection of books and online resources, seminar halls, auditoriums, sports facilities, and hostel accommodation for students.

Industry Collaborations and Internship Programs: CMRIT has established collaborations with various industries and organizations to facilitate industry exposure and internships for its students. These collaborations help students gain practical knowledge and experience in their respective fields.

Placement Opportunities: The institute has a dedicated placement cell that facilitates campus placements for its students. Many reputed companies from various sectors visit the campus for recruitment drives, offering job opportunities to eligible students.

Research and Innovation: CMRIT encourages research and innovation among its students and faculty members. The institute supports research initiatives through funding, collaboration with industry partners, and participation in conferences and seminars.

Student Activities: CMRIT promotes extracurricular activities, clubs, and student organizations to foster overall personality development and a vibrant campus life. These activities include technical events, cultural festivals, sports competitions, and community service initiatives.

CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT) in Hyderabad, Telangana, stands as a prominent institution in the field of engineering education. Here's a more detailed overview of CMRIT:

Accreditations and Affiliations: CMR Institute of Technology holds approval from the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Hyderabad. These accreditations ensure that the academic programs offered by CMRIT adhere to national standards of quality education.

Courses Offered: CMRIT offers a wide range of academic programs including undergraduate (B.Tech), postgraduate (M.Tech), and doctoral (Ph.D.) programs. The institute provides courses in various disciplines of engineering, technology, and management. Some of the popular branches include Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Information Technology, Civil Engineering, and Electrical and Electronics Engineering.

Faculty: CMRIT prides itself on its distinguished faculty team comprising experienced professors, associate professors, and assistant professors. These faculty members are not only dedicated to delivering quality education but also actively engage in research and industry collaborations, enriching the learning experience for students.

Infrastructure: CMRIT boasts a modern campus equipped with state-of-the-art facilities. This includes spacious and well-equipped classrooms, advanced laboratories, a central library stocked with an extensive collection of books and online resources, seminar halls, auditoriums, sports facilities, and comfortable hostel accommodation for students.

Industry Collaborations and Internship Programs: CMRIT has forged strong collaborations with various industries and organizations to provide students with exposure to real-world challenges and opportunities through internships. These collaborations play a crucial role in enhancing students' practical knowledge and skills, making them industry-ready professionals.

Placement Opportunities: CMRIT maintains a dedicated placement cell that works tirelessly to facilitate campus placements for its students. The institute attracts numerous reputed companies from diverse sectors to conduct recruitment drives on campus, offering promising job opportunities to eligible students.

Research and Innovation: CMRIT fosters a culture of research and innovation among its students and faculty members. The institute actively supports research initiatives through funding, industry collaborations, and participation in conferences and seminars, encouraging students to explore new ideas and contribute to the advancement of knowledge.

Student Activities: CMRIT places significant emphasis on extracurricular activities, clubs, and student organizations to promote overall personality development and a vibrant campus life. These activities include technical events, cultural festivals, sports competitions, community service initiatives, and more, providing students with a well-rounded educational experience.
